participant_1.background:
I'd rather not talk about my parents, but I'm happy to answer any other questions.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
i cannot stand clutter or dust.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.

participant_2.background:
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
i love bruno mars.
I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.
i weight 300 pounds.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
Hey, I'm doing good! Just got back from a long run.
Nice! I'm not much of a runner myself, but I do enjoy walking.
Walking is great! I just started running because I want to get fit.
That's awesome! What's your goal with the running?
I want to be able to run a marathon!
That's a great goal! I'm sure you can do it if you keep practicing.
Thanks! I'm going to need all the help I can get.
I'm sure you'll do great. What are you doing after your run?
I'm going to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
Sounds delicious! Tacos are my favorite food.
They're so good! I love them with all the fixings.
Me too! I could eat tacos every day.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I agree! I'm glad I ran into you today.
Me too! Have a great rest of your day!
